mapper.insert: INSERT INTO i080j_crm_collection_rule_history(product_name, acquisition_cycle, payment_frequency, company_max_base_num, company_min_base_num, employee_max_base_num, employee_min_base_num, company_surcharge_value, employee_surcharge_value, company_ratio, employee_ratio, effective_start_month, effective_termination_month, company_rounding_policy, employee_rounding_policy, company_precision, employee_precision, product_description, id, parentId, sortKey) SELECT product_name, acquisition_cycle, payment_frequency, company_max_base_num, company_min_base_num, employee_max_base_num, employee_min_base_num, company_surcharge_value, employee_surcharge_value, company_ratio, employee_ratio, effective_start_month, effective_termination_month, company_rounding_policy, employee_rounding_policy, company_precision, employee_precision, product_description, id, parentId, sortKey FROM i080j_crm_collection_rule WHERE effective_termination_month IS NOT NULL AND DATE_FORMAT(effective_termination_month, '%Y%m') < DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM i080j_crm_collection_rule WHERE effective_termination_month IS NOT NULL AND DATE_FORMAT(effective_termination_month, '%Y%m') < DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM i080j_crm_payment_rules WHERE parentId = #{parentId} AND product_name IN ('养老保险', '医疗保险', '失业保险', '工伤保险', '生育保险', '大病保险', '综合保险', '补充工伤') AND effective_start_month IS NOT NULL AND ((DATE_FORMAT(effective_start_month, '%Y%m') <= #{startMonth} AND (effective_termination_month IS NULL OR DATE_FORMAT(effective_termination_month, '%Y%m') >= #{startMonth})) OR (DATE_FORMAT(effective_start_month, '%Y%m') <= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m') AND (effective_termination_month IS NULL OR DATE_FORMAT(effective_termination_month, '%Y%m') >= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m')))) ORDER BY product_name, effective_start_month DESC

SELECT * FROM i080j_crm_payment_rules WHERE parentId = #{parentId} AND product_name IN (#{productName}, '补充公积金') AND effective_start_month IS NOT NULL AND company_ratio = #{companyRatio} AND employee_ratio = #{employeeRatio} AND ((DATE_FORMAT(effective_start_month, '%Y%m') <= #{startMonth} AND (effective_termination_month IS NULL OR DATE_FORMAT(effective_termination_month, '%Y%m') >= #{startMonth})) OR (DATE_FORMAT(effective_start_month, '%Y%m') <= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m') AND (effective_termination_month IS NULL OR DATE_FORMAT(effective_termination_month, '%Y%m') >= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m')))) ORDER BY product_name, effective_start_month DESC

SELECT * FROM i080j_crm_collection_rule WHERE parentId = #{parentId} AND product_name IN ('养老保险', '医疗保险', '失业保险', '工伤保险', '生育保险', '大病保险', '综合保险', '补充工伤') AND effective_start_month IS NOT NULL AND DATE_FORMAT(effective_start_month, '%Y%m') <= #{startMonth} AND (effective_termination_month IS NULL OR DATE_FORMAT(effective_termination_month, '%Y%m') >= #{startMonth}) ORDER BY product_name, effective_start_month

SELECT * FROM i080j_crm_collection_rule WHERE parentId IN (SELECT id FROM i080j_n_collection_rule_maintain WHERE city = #{city} AND welfare_handler = #{welfareHandler}) HAVING effective_start_month = (SELECT MAX(effective_start_month) FROM i080j_crm_collection_rule WHERE parentId IN (SELECT id FROM i080j_n_collection_rule_maintain WHERE city = #{city} AND welfare_handler = #{welfareHandler}) AND product_name LIKE '%公积金%') AND company_ratio = #{companyRadio}
